channel.title: MSN custom emotion help! ( How to get them bigger )
channel.description: Everytime I add an emotion of my own on msn, it ends up being very small and hard to see the gif even tho they're actually larger. I'm almost positive theres a way to get around this I just can't find it.

item.title: MSN custom emotion help! ( How to get them bigger )
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I coulda sworn there was a way… oh well, goodluck.

Read full topic

item.title: MSN custom emotion help! ( How to get them bigger )
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

I dont think you can anymore, ever since version 7? the msn client resizes them, you can download mods which makes YOUR client to display them at full size but the person you send it to will it scaled down.

Read full topic
